Sennheiser URBANITE is for uncompromising ears; those that won’t settle for weak audio quality, lousy fit and lame styling. Experience the beat all over again, with bass that never sounded that good! They’re built tough with stainless steel hinges and aluminium ear cup sliders. URBANITE is made to go, just fold’em up and take them everywhere. The integrated in-line remote control and microphone let’s you take calls and control your music on smartphones and tablets, these phones keep you connected. Two versions are available, one for Apple iOS and one for Samsung Galaxy devices. Sennheiser URBANITE is the sound your ears have been waiting for.

Description.Heading: Description
Description.MainPara: A piano comes into this world through the perfect synergy of advanced technical skill and artistry. Such a piano can create sound that truly reflects the player's feelings. The final stage in piano production is called “voicing.” This breathes life into the instrument and truly makes it musical. To accomplish this, highly skilled experts focus their concentration and sensitivity completely on each note and delicately adjust the hardness and resilience of the hammers that strike the strings, establishing the perfect, consistent sound for the entire instrument and determining its tonal personality.

Use it as a stand-alone streaming music system or add more MusicCast products like additional speakers, AV receivers or sound bars over time and control them all with a simple app. In addition to Wi-Fi, this speaker also supports Bluetooth® and AirPlay®, allowing for greater wireless connection flexibility. Two units can be used in stereo mode for a more expansive and lifelike listening experience.

Access to your music library, Pandora®, Napster, TIDAL, Deezer, Spotify, SiriusXM Internet Radio and more

The ergonomic around-ear design means that your entertainment continues and your fun factor gets amped up no matter what you’re doing – working, commuting, or just making your way around town. Multi-device connectivity allows you to seamlessly switch between two devices, so you never miss a call. With a sleek appearance, various color options and the added convenience of a detachable cable with remote and microphone, you’ll never want to be seen without your E55BT headphones.

Prepare to travel in a completely different way. The Harman Kardon Esquire is your new, on-the-road, wireless audio system. Esquire is a Bluetooth®-enabled speaker with a built- in conference phone system that redefines how you take your music with you. This durable, portable speaker is crafted out of fine materials with a leather panel and metal finish on the outside. On this inside, it’s pure Harman Kardon engineering, with dual drivers and a built-in bass port for clear sound, as well as custom-tuned microphones and noise cancellation technology for clear conference calls from your Bluetooth®-enabled smart phone

Description.Heading: Description
Description.MainPara: (S) stands for small and from the outside, that is exactly what this speaker is. Highly compact and perfectly portable. But behind the fabric, (S) boasts a range of components selected for the most powerful and high quality performance you can fit into a speaker this size. So the sound is anything but small.

List.list: Two full range drivers, subwoofer and passive bass radiator deliver incredibly powerful sound from a compact form.
Connect any Bluetooth device and if your device supports NFC, simply tap it against the NFC logo on the top panel to connect.
Non-bluetooth enabled devices can still experience (S) sound quality by using the included 3.5mm cable.
14 hour built in battery means that (S) can stay firmly by your side wherever you may roam. We’ve also included a button that lets you check how much battery you have left.

Description.Heading: Description
Description.MainPara: There’s no disguising that (M) was made by Hi-Fi engineers. Yes, a one box speaker is practical and space efficient, but from a sound perspective this is a compromise. Recorded music is mastered to be heard in stereo, and for that you need two speakers. Which is why we’re introducing L+R channel into the world of portable Bluetooth speakers.

List.list: (M) speakers connect together to deliver exceptional L+R channel playback of your digital files.
Each (M) has one full range driver and a subwoofer which deliver incredibly powerful stereo sound from compact profiles.
Control your playback hands free by swiping your hand across the control panels. Useful mid-pasta making session or flower-bed digging.
Built-in high quality microphone lets you make and receive calls using the speakers. Useful for group chats and keeping hands free.

Just start with “Ok Google” – a simple voice request triggers your JBL Link 20 to play music, podcasts or radio from services like Google Play Music, Spotify, Pandora and more. This compact speaker is powered by a 6000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery that offers 10 hours of continuous, high-quality audio playtime. X-Motion Clarity technology makes action scenes look like real life.

It’s more than just a LED - It’s what 4K HDR LEDs aspire to be.

Description.Heading: Description
Description.MainPara: Introducing JBL Tune 205BT wireless earbud headphones with JBL Pure Bass Sound. Thanks to the 6-hour battery life they can wirelessly stream JBL Pure Bass sound and provide hands-free call management. Inside the premium housing is a pair of 12.5 mm drivers which will punch out some serious bass, while the soft, ergonomically shaped earbuds ensure the listening experience remains comfortable for long-listening hours. In addition, a single-button remote lets you control music playback, as well as answer calls on the fly with the built-in microphone, making the JBL Tune 205BT your everyday companion for work, at home and on the go.

Sales.ProductName: JBL Link 20 Voice Activated Portable Speaker

Description.Heading: Description
Description.MainPara: The JBL Link 20 is a voice activated portable speaker with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth® enabled that delivers rich stereo sound. It has the Google Assistant built-in. It’s your own personal Google. Always ready to help. You can ask it questions. And tell it to do things. The more you use it, the more useful it gets. Just start with “Ok Google” – a simple voice request triggers your JBL Link 20 to play music, podcasts or radio from services like Google Play Music, Spotify, Pandora and more. This compact speaker is powered by a 6000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery that offers 10 hours of continuous, high-quality audio playtime. Sporting durable, waterproof fabric materials, JBL Link 20 is ready to take the party everywhere. And with the Chromecast built-in, you can instantly start streaming to JBL Link 20 from your favorite music apps.

List.list: Chromecast built-in
24 bit/96kHz High quality sound, powered by the cloud
Multi-room playback across speakers that have Chromecast built-in
Wireless Bluetooth® streaming
